categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Evax was a fair-skinned Human male with brown hair who served as an Imperial officer during the Galactic Civil War fought between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. By the year 0 BBY, Evax became a leader in Imperial Intelligence, having a proven track record for predicting Alliance Fleet movements, and his coordination of starship maneuvers saved many vulnerable bases.

In 0 BBY, Evax was aboard the Imperial Death Star I battlestation during the Battle of Yavin, where Alliance starfighters attacked the Death Star over the Yavin system. Evax was killed in the station's subsequent destruction. Evax wore the same uniform worn by other Imperial Intelligence members.
Evax was created for the 1996 A New Hope Limited expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Star Wars Customizable Card Game.
